index.subtitle: We provide tooling for creating, deploying, managing, and joining DAOs. Built with love on Juno.

infoCard1.title: Create DAOs
infoCard1.body: Make DAOs with a visual interface. No command line required.

infoCard2.title: Propose and vote
infoCard2.body: Create and vote on proposals without writing code.

infoCard3.title: Launch tokens
infoCard3.body: Launch your token. Share them across any chain that supports IBC.
